website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an attractive model with craftsmanship and a warranty to back it, you will be impressed with this fan. A superior choice.
pros: In addition to the sturdy build, ample airflow, and quiet operation, it sports the classic petal design that looks great outdoors
Limited lifetime motor warranty and 1-year parts warranty
cons: A bit pricey, and the mounted wall control is a separate purchase

customer_reviews.title: it's so quiet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement, the design was the closest to our original . We are extremely pleased with it. It is whisper quiet. I have to look at it in order to see if on.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and the air flow is just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The fan is hanging in my pergola. It looks great and the air flow is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Harold A. Kime

customer_reviews.title: I was worried about the noise of some fans on high speed but this one produces a nice breeze for those hot days and was not loud
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very quiet when running, I was worried about the noise of some fans on high speed but this one produces a nice breeze for those hot days and was not loud. Its a nice looking fan and seems well built to last in the outdoor weather. I have mine installed in our pergola so it will get hit by rain and sun. Hopefully it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Creviston

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fan....
customer_reviews.text: Great quality fan... You can tell the quality just from the feel, they have good weight to them and overall construction is good. They also move a good amount of air as well.
customer_reviews.author: nbiron

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this fan.
customer_reviews.text: we have it on our porch and it looks FABULOUS - stunning and makes a real statement. We have only turned it on to check it out, as it is winter in MD --we do look forward to really enjoying our porch and this unit.
customer_reviews.author: maryann2h

customer_reviews.title: I feel like its hard to find a white ceiling fan that ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like its hard to find a white ceiling fan that doesn't look cheesy, but this fan is beautiful!! Its classy and substantial and the finish on everything is spectacular! It doesn't come with a light kit but it is light kit adaptable. I bought the Emerson School House light fixture to use with this and its perfect. It looks as though it were made specifically for this ceiling fan. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Good: happy with fan
customer_reviews.text: every thing wanted with outdoor fan: no noise, keeps bugs away with breeze, looks good, and working well. Is subject to salty air every day so we will see how it stands up. Has been in one rain storm so far with no adverse effect. After about 3 month installed; we would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FlagstaffGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very tropical looking with modern color
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE! See my pictures. It came with lots of secure packing material. Instructions were easy to follow. Installing no problem at all. This fan is not only looking pretty. It is quiet and effective. Great product. Got a lot of compliments already.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Not really wet capable but close - damp? Otherwise excellent ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on back porch from a pergola. Ceiling cover attached to a 2by6 beam. Had to install a plexiglas 2x3 over it to prevent water from getting into ceiling wiring. Rest of unit is well sealed from water. Big powerful motor, so should last long time. Looks as good as pictures show!
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: which is a good thing. It was packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is made in China, it appears to be well made. motor is heavy, which is a good thing. It was packaged very well. Easy to install and it looks great. Time will tell how it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fan well made fits well on our covered porch ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan well made fits well on our covered porch bought the two foot rod looks much better then the 6 inch rod in the box cost was an extra $24 dollars
customer_reviews.author: matthew defilippo

customer_reviews.title: Quality ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for the outside lanai. Excellent air movement and quiet operation. Well constructed and beautiful design. Be sure to get the rod extension bracket sold separately if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H. DeFrancesco

customer_reviews.title: Attractive for Indoor Use, too!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a bedroom in white with the beige rattan leaves and it looks awesome. Emerson has been one of my favorite brands for decades and the company makes quality products.
customer_reviews.author: wisebuyer

customer_reviews.title: almost 5 stars...
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan. Puts out a lot of air, looks great and is noiseless and wobble free on the 3 foot down rod I have it installed on. I would give it 5 stars but the light kit was NOT included as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: BobKat

customer_reviews.title: Quality and great Seller
customer_reviews.text: You don’t need to know anything more about this product than: it is the best quality, quite, well made outdoor ceiling fan I have found. The seller was terrific to work with!
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Fan is a good size and looks good. Works well in my lanai and have had no problems with it. Produces a good breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ehmer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of blades, motor,finish, etc is the best you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. Perfectly balanced fan blades with no adjustments needed. The blades continue to rotate several minutes after the is turned off. Air flow is good.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Bates

customer_reviews.title: com(not sure why they where not included) but this fan went together and operates AMAZING! perfect for our veranda in southern F
customer_reviews.text: After downloading assembly instructions from Emerson.com(not sure why they where not included) but this fan went together and operates AMAZING! perfect for our veranda in southern Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Scott ShangrawTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect in our screened in porch. Exactly what we wanted. Due to some transportation issues (with COVID) there was some delay which was frustrating, but worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is fantastic! I researched so many to put under a pergola and this hands down the only one with enough confidence for me to try it. It was installed earlier this month and runs so quietly, looks great and pushes down some good air flow! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: This Fan is Tough.  Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Each year I have had to install a new fan on our outdoor patio due to wind damage over the winter. This fan is built solid and has survived some very serious wind conditions. Best quality product I have found in years.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hauck

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding fan!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan and works perfectly!! We installed ours on the outdoor porch of our beach house and added a ceiling medallion to the installation and love the look.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the fan installed on my patio. Looks great! Cools it down very well. Well made and quit.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fan for an outdoor patio.
customer_reviews.text: This fan was just perfect for our outdoor patio that is upstairs off the kitchen. The color matched the ceiling and the furniture. This fan has just the right airflow for an outdoor fan. We did have to buy a wall switch for fan speed, and hire an electrician to assemble and install. He also said it was one of the best fans he has installed for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Frank of Lakewood CO

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Put it on the deck of our condo that is our vacation home. It works great and looks great too! Recommended by a relative that is a contractor to put this one up for an outside area.
customer_reviews.author: BarbD

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, great quality, outdoor, wet environment fan.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan! Looks great on our deck overlooking our pool. Light fixture also an Emerson product and purchased separately is a spot on match.
customer_reviews.author: Education Professor

customer_reviews.title: Looks/works great in our new sun room
customer_reviews.text: Looks/works great in our new sun room. The canopy had a ding in it that must have happened before it was initially packaged, but Emerson was good and quick to replace that part at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Clover Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very elegantt!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the touch it adds to my seating room. Very elegant!!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ceiling fan is beautiful. Puts out lots of air. Very pleases
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Everything great! I am real picky and research all items I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca O.

customer_reviews.title: No issues .. nice quality fan .
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for ... soundless and great air for outdoor space .
customer_reviews.author: Bell_Daze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Casablanca look. Great workmanship and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Elvira M. Kohner

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Performance
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality and results. They look terrific on my Arizona Patio, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan. Purchased to install on our new pergola which has a louvered roof system so wet rating was a must. It was easy to put together & install. Purchased the Emerson remote w/the fan & installation of the transmitter was easy. Both are functioning beautifully & the fan puts out a good amount of breeze.
customer_reviews.author: SFA/TXTECHMom

customer_reviews.title: Shakes at low speeds. Is there a balancing kit ...
customer_reviews.text: Shakes at low speeds. Is there a balancing kit avavilable?
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy tumblin

product_meta.title: Emerson Ceiling Fans CF621SW Batalie Breeze 52-Inch Indoor Outdoor Ceiling Fan, Wet Rated, Light Kit Adaptable, Satin White Finish
product_meta.description: Color:Satin WhiteThe 52-inch Batalie Breeze outdoor ceiling fan in the Satin White finish is the perfect addition to any décor. A 4-1/2-inch downrod comes standard, along with 5 tropical Rattan-style ceiling fan blades. With its Wet Location rating, this outdoor ceiling fan is an elegant choice for worry-free hanging on patios, decks and verandas, regardless of exposure to precipitation. Feel secure with your purchase knowing that it is backed by a Limited Lifetime Motor Warranty. Upgrade your ceiling fan features with a remote or wall control for ease of use while relaxing in your outdoor living area.
feature_bullets: A 52-inch blade span makes the Batalie Breeze in Satin White a perfect indoor or outdoor ceiling fan.
Wet Location rating makes this perfect for any outdoor space
Light fixture adaptable with option to purchase remote or wall controls
The Batalie Breeze includes a Limited Lifetime Motor Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars87 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
